properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rattan is wondrous Use it for tent poles Make a pavilion Like they do in the East.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Fighters just love it Make weapons from it Would probably marry A Rattan Queen.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: That Rattan Tape it, don't waste it. Rattan! Don't cha just love Rattan? Rattan! Rattan! (Bum dum dum dum dum)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Soaking is bad Don't laminate either Unless you would like to Hear Marshals scream

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Tape is the preference Mark out the edges Make it look wooden Make it look real.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Word in the mundane Rattan is furniture See just how limited The real world can be.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Hear in the ages We use it for all things We use it oh so ho Creatively.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: I know a fighter Comes from (random kingdom name) Didn't wear his Cup in fight.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Now he is using Rattan in a new way His lady just loves it Fits like a dream.
